    def excerpt_for(string, model = nil)
      if model.nil? && one_class
        model ||= one_class
      end
      
      populate
      client.excerpts(
        :docs   => [string],
        :words  => results[:words].keys.join(' '),
        :index  => "#{model.source_of_sphinx_index.sphinx_name}_core"
      ).first
    end
